download_issue.subject: Re: Download Issue - Order #{{order_id}}
download_issue.body:
Hi {{customer_name}},

Sorry to hear you're having trouble downloading your purchase!

Here are a few quick fixes:

1. **Check your Gumroad Library**: https://app.gumroad.com/library
   Your purchase should appear there with a fresh download link.

2. **Try a different browser**: Sometimes browser extensions block downloads.

3. **Check spam folder**: The download email might have landed there.

If none of these work, please reply with:
- Your order number
- What happens when you click the download link
- What browser you're using

I'll get this sorted for you ASAP!

Best,
Matt
BrainOps Support

technical_help.subject: Re: Technical Issue - {{product_name}}
technical_help.body:
Hi {{customer_name}},

Thanks for reaching out! I'd be happy to help you get this working.

To troubleshoot effectively, could you please send me:

1. **Screenshot of the error** (if any)
2. **What you were trying to do** when it happened
3. **Your environment**:
   - Operating system (Windows/Mac/Linux)
   - Node version (run: node --version)
   - Any other relevant details

Once I have this info, I'll send you step-by-step instructions to fix it.

Usually, these issues are quick to resolve!

Best,
Matt
BrainOps Support
